fixes.name: Active Employees
fixes.dax_expression: SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Employee Count]) - SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Attrition Count])
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau aggregations to DAX by wrapping each referenced field with SUM() and mapping column references to the table-qualified format 'HR data (HR Data)'[Column]. Kept as a measure because the expression uses aggregations (SUM).
